entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IConfiguration not resolving inside plugins #111022
    Future
  • android quic ConnectAsync throw exception #111019
  • Performance regression come again on dotnet 9 #111016

Closed

  • Bug with DateTime and leap year #111021
  • Repeated return in ArrayPool #110582
  • [API Proposal]: Enum validation #111018
  • Allow use of CONNECT tunneling for unencrypted requests #37690
  • MemoryAllocatedForJitCode ETW Event missing in trace, but CLRStackWalk still fires #102004
  • ServiceController constructor throws exception with Nuget library 9.0 in .NET6 #110354

PullRequests

Created

  • Speeding up `Random.Shuffle` by batching #111015
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix reporting GC fields from base types #111011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix conflicting HttpClient configs #110999
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NET9.0.0 Blazor @onclick:preventDefault is not working in Balzor NET. It was working in Blazor NET7. #59687
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #59686
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #59685
  • Perf improvement: https, json, single_query #59684
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, fortunes, mvc #59683
  • suggested feature:Prepared `GenerateJwtToken` Method #59680
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi generates a class that does not exist but is like a other class with a number added to the end of the name #59677
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation #59676
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59675
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, json_middleware #59674
  • Permformance issue with `StaticAssetDevelopmentRuntimeHandler.EnableSupport`. #59673

Closed

  • ### Feature Request: Default JWT Token Validation Parameters #59681
  • Hackear Instagram de Alguém 2025 #59682

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d144031` to `7d76a23` #59679
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d144031` to `7d76a23` #59678
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #59672
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with logInit Undefined in MAUI Blazor App on API 28 but Works on API 34 #26902
  • [iOS] Scroll view doesn't scroll when its height is explicitly set #26900
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Resize(Text size) "Organize a Friends Get together" list item in task section is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26899
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Incorrect name is defined for Plus(+) button in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26898
    .NET 9 SR4
  • No name is defined for Analyze survey results, Develop action plan, Read a book in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26897
    .NET 9 SR4
  • No name is defined for All cleared button in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26896
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Role is not defined for "Improve work life balance, Learn to speak another language" as buttons or cards in Projects section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name role value. #26895
    .NET 9 SR4

Closed

  • CharacterSpacing issue with Button Text in iOS #26901
  • [Android] Debug stops when open a FilePicker #26639
  • Can't debug with VSCode or Visual Studio for Windows #26627
  • .Net Won't Run Android Emulator #26592
  • Hyper-V in windows features was not there to activate #26778
  • Error building with XCODE 16.1 #26859
  • .NET MAUI does not show in Visual Studio #26870
  • TimePicker Displays AM/PM Text in Different Languages with hh:mm tt Format on .NET 9 SDK (iOS Only) #26885

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Improve accessibility sample content new project template #26903
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR4
  • [iOS] Simplify iOS ScrollView - improvement #26893
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview

Merged

  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification - 2 #26874
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
